top_categories.workout_context: Grinduro California’s sierra nevada singletrack (50%), gravel roads (30%) demands rapid power changes — surge over obstacles, settle on smoother sections, repeat for hours.
Racing Grinduro California isn’t just fitness — it’s pacing, fueling, and executing when conditions deteriorate. This workout practices the race itself.
Grinduro California’s sierra nevada enduro—singletrack descents + gravel climbs and competitive field demand explosive aerobic capacity — the ability to respond to surges without blowing up.
Critical power determines how long you can sustain above-threshold efforts at Grinduro California — a higher CP means more time in the red before failure.
Grinduro California rewards athletes who can hold sustained power without blowing up — threshold is the engine that drives everything above Zone 2.
Over-unders train the lactate clearance you’ll need at Grinduro California when surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding hard.
Grinduro California’s sierra nevada enduro—singletrack descents + gravel climbs drains energy reserves faster than the distance suggests — durability training bridges the gap.
Short, violent efforts are unavoidable at Grinduro California — climbs demanding 2-minute maximal efforts, surges to close gaps, attacks on sierra nevada enduro—singletrack descents + gravel climbs.
The G-Spot zone (88–92% FTP) is where you’ll spend the hardest sustained miles of Grinduro California. Make this intensity feel like home.
Grinduro California’s 6,500ft of climbing demands seated and standing versatility — the ability to change climbing style as gradient and fatigue dictate.
Cadence efficiency makes every pedal stroke at Grinduro California count — smooth technique reduces muscular fatigue over long distances.
Low-cadence force work builds the muscular strength for Grinduro California’s 6,500ft of climbing — especially the grinding, low-speed ascents.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Grinduro California’s 60 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.altitude: Moderate altitude at Grinduro California. Arrive 2–3 days early. Reduce intensity expectations by 5–10%. Hydrate aggressively.
race_overlay.terrain: Highly technical terrain at Grinduro California demands practice on similar surfaces. Ride sierra nevada enduro—singletrack descents + gravel climbs at race-day cadence weekly. Expect: sierra nevada singletrack (50%), gravel roads (30%), dirt roads (20%). Practice cornering, descending, and power delivery on unstable surfaces. Dial in tire pressure before race week — 5 PSI wrong costs you 15+ minutes over 60 miles.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on Gravel Specific, Race Simulation, and VO2max to prepare you for 60 miles of sierra nevada enduro—singletrack descents + gravel climbs in Quincy, California (Plumas County).
